usage.cn: 人生就像愤怒的小鸟，当你失败时，总有几头猪在笑！
usage.eng: Life is like angry birds.There are always several pigs laughing when you lose.

usage.cn: 如果一个女人真的爱你，她会因为很多事情对你发脾气，却始终坚守在你身边
usage.eng: A woman who truly loves you will be angry at you for many things, but will stick around.

usage.cn: 不要忘掉别人生气时候说的话，因为往往那才是真相！
usage.eng: Never forget what someone says to you when they're angry, because that's when the cover-up truth comes out.

usage.cn: 伤害是个可笑的东西。同样一件事情，折腾出此人的愤怒，彼人的悔恨。- The Tale of Despereaux
usage.eng: You know hurt is a funny thing. The same thing that makes one person angry, can put another person into grief.”
